emotecraft.options.keybind: Set a custom key to play the selected emote
emotecraft.options.fastmenu: Select an emote than click to
emotecraft.options.fastmenu2: to add to the fast-choose wheel.
emotecraft.sure2:
An other emote has this keybind.
Do you want to reset that and set the key to this?
emotecraft.otherconfig.validate.tooltip: Only for PvP worlds, where somebody want to cheat. It won't allow emotes, what makes too much offset
emotecraft.otherconfig.validationThresho: Exactly how much offset is too much
emotecraft.otherconfig.showicon: Show icons instead of emote names
emotecraft.otherconfig.stopthreshold: Stop emote at this speed threshold
emotecraft.otherconfig.stopthreshold.too:
(0.22 is walking speed)
with large value, you won't stop playing the emote. You can still use the stop play key
emotecraft.otherconfig.yratio: Y axis moving influence in stop threshold
emotecraft.otherconfig.loadbuiltin.toolt: If you want to remove these for some reason...
emotecraft.otherconfig.playersafety.tool: won't show emotes from muted players (1.16.4+)
emotecraft.otherconfig.perspective: Enable 3rd person perspective while playing an emote
emotecraft.otherconfig.prespective_redux: only active when 3rd person perspective is enabled
emotecraft.otherconfig.enableNSFW: Allow NSFW emotes to be played
emotecraft.otherconfig.enableNSFW.toolti:
NSFW (Not Safe For Work) inappropriate content

May contain nudity, intense sexuality, violence or other potentially disturbing subject matter.
emotecraft.otherconfig.alwaysValidateEmo:
Client side option, won't affect internal server

By default, client-side validation only happens when receiving emote from an untrusted proxy.
Use this to always do client-side validation
emotecraft.otherconfig.default3rdPersonF: Use front view instead of back when playing emotes
These configs are unstable or not meant to be used without programming knowledge
Most of these are for testing
emotecraft.otherconfig.emotesFolderOnLog: DO NOT TURN ON  Load emotes on logical server

KEEP IT DISABLED
The internal server will load the client emotes instead of the client
If you enable it, emotes will only work in singleplayer
emotecraft.no_server: Server has no Emotecraft installed, others won't see if you play an emote
emotecraft.different_server: Server has a different version of Emotecraft installed, others may not see correctly your emotes
emotecraft.otherconfig.quark.tooltip:
Quark emote reader is highly unstable and not fully supported.
Using it is not recommend. It can work unexpectedly or even can cause crash
emotecraft.emote.author: Author:
emotecraft.blockedEmote: You are not allowed to play this emote
emotecraft.resetConfig.title: Reset every Emotecraft config
emotecraft.resetConfig.message: Do you really want to reset the config?
emotecraft.resetAllKeys.title: Reset all emote keybinding
emotecraft.resetAllKeys.message: Do you really want to reset every emote keybinding?
emotecraft.song_too_big_to_send: Song is too big, can not send to server. Sending emote only
